mapper.select: select date_format(d.dealDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as dealDate, b.buyPrice, b.size from deal d, buy b where d.buyCode = b.buyCode and b.modelNum = #{modelNum} order by d.dealDate desc
select count(*) as cntDeal, avg(b.buyPrice) as avgDeal from deal d, buy b where d.buyCode = b.buyCode and b.modelNum = #{modelNum} group by dealDate

select b.buyPrice, b.size, date_format(b.buyDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as buyDate from buy b where b.buyCode not in (select d.buyCode from deal d) and date_format(b.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') and b.modelNum = #{modelNum} order by b.buyDate desc

select s.salesPrice, s.size, date_format(s.saleDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as saleDate from sales s where s.salesCode not in (select d.salesCode from deal d) and s.modelNum = #{modelNum} order by s.saleDate desc
